verses.kjv: O give thanks unto the LORD; for he is good: for his mercy endureth for ever.
verses.ct: Thank the LORD, because he is good — his mercy lasts forever.

verses.kjv: O give thanks unto the God of gods: for his mercy endureth for ever.
verses.ct: Thank the God above all gods — his mercy lasts forever.

verses.kjv: O give thanks to the Lord of lords: for his mercy endureth for ever.
verses.ct: Thank the Lord above all lords — his mercy lasts forever.

verses.kjv: To him who alone doeth great wonders: for his mercy endureth for ever.
verses.ct: He alone performs incredible wonders — his mercy lasts forever.

verses.kjv: To him that by wisdom made the heavens: for his mercy endureth for ever.
verses.ct: Through wisdom he made the heavens — his mercy lasts forever.

verses.kjv: To him that stretched out the earth above the waters: for his mercy endureth for ever.
verses.ct: He spread the earth out over the waters — his mercy lasts forever.

verses.kjv: To him that made great lights: for his mercy endureth for ever:
verses.ct: He made the great lights — his mercy lasts forever.

verses.kjv: The sun to rule by day: for his mercy endureth for ever:
verses.ct: The sun to govern the day — his mercy lasts forever.

verses.kjv: The moon and stars to rule by night: for his mercy endureth for ever.
verses.ct: The moon and stars to govern the night — his mercy lasts forever.

verses.kjv: To him that smote Egypt in their firstborn: for his mercy endureth for ever:
verses.ct: He struck down the firstborn of Egypt — his mercy lasts forever.

verses.kjv: And brought out Israel from among them: for his mercy endureth for ever:
verses.ct: He brought Israel out from among them — his mercy lasts forever.

verses.kjv: With a strong hand, and with a stretched out arm: for his mercy endureth for ever.
verses.ct: With a powerful hand and an outstretched arm — his mercy lasts forever.

verses.kjv: To him which divided the Red sea into parts: for his mercy endureth for ever:
verses.ct: He split the Red Sea in two — his mercy lasts forever.

verses.kjv: And made Israel to pass through the midst of it: for his mercy endureth for ever:
verses.ct: He led Israel right through the middle of it — his mercy lasts forever.

verses.kjv: But overthrew Pharaoh and his host in the Red sea: for his mercy endureth for ever.
verses.ct: But he swept Pharaoh and his army into the Red Sea — his mercy lasts forever.

verses.kjv: To him which led his people through the wilderness: for his mercy endureth for ever.
verses.ct: He guided his people through the wilderness — his mercy lasts forever.

verses.kjv: To him which smote great kings: for his mercy endureth for ever:
verses.ct: He struck down mighty kings — his mercy lasts forever.

verses.kjv: And slew famous kings: for his mercy endureth for ever:
verses.ct: He killed powerful kings — his mercy lasts forever.

verses.kjv: Sihon king of the Amorites: for his mercy endureth for ever:
verses.ct: Sihon, king of the Amorites — his mercy lasts forever.

verses.kjv: And Og the king of Bashan: for his mercy endureth for ever:
verses.ct: And Og, king of Bashan — his mercy lasts forever.

verses.kjv: And gave their land for an heritage: for his mercy endureth for ever:
verses.ct: He handed over their land as an inheritance — his mercy lasts forever.

verses.kjv: Even an heritage unto Israel his servant: for his mercy endureth for ever.
verses.ct: An inheritance for Israel, his servant — his mercy lasts forever.

verses.kjv: Who remembered us in our low estate: for his mercy endureth for ever:
verses.ct: He remembered us when we were at our lowest — his mercy lasts forever.

verses.kjv: And hath redeemed us from our enemies: for his mercy endureth for ever.
verses.ct: He rescued us from our enemies — his mercy lasts forever.

verses.kjv: Who giveth food to all flesh: for his mercy endureth for ever.
verses.ct: He provides food to every living creature — his mercy lasts forever.

verses.kjv: O give thanks unto the God of heaven: for his mercy endureth for ever.
verses.ct: Thank the God of heaven — his mercy lasts forever.
